channel.title: Forecasting on Mark LeBoeuf
channel.description: Recent content in Forecasting on Mark LeBoeuf

item.title: Time Series Outlier Detection
item.description: This post covers a straightforward approach to detecting and replacing outliers in time series.

item.title: Establishing Causality with Counterfactual Prediction
item.description: Sometimes a controlled experiment isn’t an option yet you want to establish causality. This post outlines a method for quantifying the effects of an intervention via counterfactual predictions.

item.title: Keras CNN Walkthrough
item.description: Identifying a trend before it starts is a major area of focus in the analytics realm, because it can inform key business decisions yet remains extremely difficult. This post outlines one trend-detection method in an effort to predict where a stock’s price will go in the future.
